Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
CB listing USDT is a 1.1-1 odds bet as the reason they required KYC.   

Not sure what their goal was here.  
I guess with more volume yesterday than BTC that makes sense but it turns crypto into a speculative trading asset class instead of a utility which it was initially set out to be. 

I don‚Äôt agree with Genie‚Äôs approach a lot of the time.   I do agree with his statements.    
We are all grown up enough to be able to agree to disagree and still work towards the same goals. 

It‚Äôs a fine line.   

Thank you for sharing the news @meatspoon

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I too, despise USDT and the idea of stablecoins.  
They‚Äôre backed by a system we‚Äôre trying to escape.  

And now that system wants to have 30% of the trading volume based on it.  Kind of sad.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: That said, even if the river we have to cross is flowing with feces, the shore on the Otherside is promising enough to do so.

Content:
